 UCPD Crime Alert: Sexual Assault & Attempted Kidnapping Occurred on Campus - June 7, 2019 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 UCPD COVID-19 Operations Status Update 
 
 
 
 
 UCPD COVID-19 Operations Status Update: 
 UCPD patrol and dispatch operations remain fully staffed and operational. 
 We are conducting high visibility patrols on and around the campus. 
 Community Service Officers continue to patrol UCR Housing areas and are available for walking escort on campus. 
 New Lobby Hours: 7:00 AM - 9:00 PM
